name: 05a_nodejs_zoom
description: 1. create a new node project such as named nodeServer 2. Type command : npm init 3. Edit file package.json, don't forget put start amd engines 4. Install express : npm install express --save  5. Install socket io : npm install socket.io --save 6. Create index.js 7. Create file for heroku : Procfile 8. To test, Run the server: node index.js 9. Go to heroku page, create new app 10. Follow the instruction to deploy this server
